ygData.subject: RE: Southern Karana
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yes he will :) Go up to him and then Sneak until he cons indifferent :) ... From: Worlord [mailto:worlord99@yahoo.com] Sent: Friday, December 10, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yes he will :)

Go up to him and then "Sneak" until he cons indifferent :)


-----Original Message-----
From: Worlord [mailto:worlord99@...]
Sent: Friday, December 10, 1999 11:07 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Southern Karana


From: Worlord <worlord99@...>

Under the advice of many people, I have moved my
hunting ground to south karana. I am currently
hunting in tha aviak town and am VERY pleased with
what I have seen.

Easily managed to find a bind to the Arena. No more
running ALL THE FRIKIN way down the path in East
Karana. Now its just a short swim.

However, I have one problem. Where can I sell? the
Aviak merchant won't sell to humans and I would really
like to find a place to buy bandages. Is their
anywhere relatively NEAR the aviak town where this can
be done?

Hammeron Stonespirit
Monk of Quellious
Karana
